subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: John Gibbons was hired as manager of the Toronto Blue Jays for the second time Tuesday, bringing him back to a team that just invigorated its roster after a blockbuster trade with the Miami Marlins.
snippet: John Gibbons was hired as manager of the Toronto Blue Jays for the second time Tuesday, bringing him back to a team that just invigorated its roster after a blockbuster trade with the Miami Marlins.
